name: ASCENXION DEMO
detailed_description:
'ASCENXION' is a game combining shoot 'em up and adventure genre that deals with the story of a mysterious being that suddenly appeared in the unknown world. Why is this being emerged? And what secrets would be hidden in this world?

Synopsis

Human civilization has collapsed. Their knowledge and records have disappeared, and even the reason for their destruction is only conjectural. Aeons passed, the mysterious beings appeared on the wreck of human civilization and start to fill the vacancy of mankind...

And one day, with the mysterious phenomenon you open your eyes in this world. What are these unknown beings? Why is mankind destroyed, and what is your identity? Guess the story by gathering various clues such as the wandering human spirits from the ancient times, the murals remaining in the map, and the relics you gather!
